      • reset

        protected void reset()
        For partial resetting of game status, method called when player(waka) has been caught by ghost. Ghost mode is restarts. Ghost and waka return to intital position. Any removed ghost is restored, while fruits and super fruit is not.

      • resetAll

        protected void resetAll()
        For resetting all game status. Method called 10 second after previous game ends and restarts the game.

        public int getFinishedTime()
